original_text: Therefore I will wail and howl, I will go stripped and naked: I will make a wailing like the dragons, and mourning as the owls.
korean_text: 이러므로 내가 애통하며 애곡하고 벌거벗은 몸으로 행하며 들개 같이 애곡하고 타조 같이 애통하리니

sentences.original_text: Therefore I will wail and howl
I will go stripped and naked
I will make a wailing like the dragons
